item.title: [unf] Carnival Carnivore
item.description:
Creature — Alien Crab Horror

Deathtouch

When Carnival Carnivore enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own.

item.title: [unf] Black Hole
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature and up to X other target creatures, where X is the number of Attractions you've visited this turn.

item.title: [unf] Discourtesy Clerk
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Employee

When Discourtesy Clerk enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more Attractions, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [unf] Deadbeat Attendant
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Employee

When Deadbeat Attendant enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

item.title: [unf] Haberthrasher
item.description:
Creature — Human Hatificer Assassin

Deathtouch

Whenever another creature that has a hat enters the battlefield under your control or a hat sticker is put on a creature you control, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [unf] Exit Through the Grift Shop
item.description:
Sorcery

Yell "Who wants a souvenir?" and announce the name of a nonland card in your graveyard. Each player in an Un-game who can hear you may bid life. You start the bidding at 0. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid. They copy the card and may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. If you didn't win the bid, you gain life equal to the high bid and create that many Treasure tokens.

item.title: [unf] Down for Repairs
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Destroy up to one Attraction that player controls. (It's put into their junkyard.)

item.title: [unf] Dissatisfied Customer
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Guest

Flying, haste

When Dissatisfied Customer enters the battlefield, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 3 or less, you lose that much life.

item.title: [unf] Disemvowel
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target creature. That creature's controller loses 1 life for each unique vowel in the creature's name. (The vowels are A, E, I, O, U, and Y.)

item.title: [unf] Questionable Cuisine
item.description:
Sorcery

Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. Create a Food token for each trash can you can see from your seat. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

item.title: [unf] Photo Op
item.description:
Sorcery

Before the game begins, you may post a picture of yourself posing like the art of any Magic card with #GuessThatMagicCard and no other text.

You may reveal a reply posted today with a guess and a card you own from outside the game with the same name as that guess. Put that card into your hand. Exile Photo Op.

item.title: [unf] Night Shift of the Living Dead
item.description:
Enchantment

After you roll a die, you may pay 1 life. If you do, increase or decrease the result by 1. Do this only once each turn.

Whenever you roll a 6, create a 2/2 black Zombie Employee creature token.

item.title: [unf] Line Cutter
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue Guest

When Line Cutter enters the battlefield, roll to visit your Attractions.

item.title: [unf] Last Voyage of the _____
item.description:
Enchantment

When this enchantment enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it, then it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield and attach this Aura to it.

Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 for each name sticker on this Aura with seven or fewer letters.

When this Aura leaves the battlefield, sacrifice enchanted creature.

item.title: [unf] Scared Stiff
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Coward Guest

Scared Stiff has menace as long as you control a stickered permanent.

item.title: [unf] Rat in the Hat
item.description:
Creature — Rat Rogue

{T}, Sacrifice Rat in the Hat: Until end of turn, you may cast target creature card that has a hate from your graveyard.

item.title: [unf] Quick Fixer
item.description:
Creature — Azra Employee

Menace

Whenever Quick Fixer deals combat damage to a player, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

item.title: [unf] A Real Handful
item.description:
Creature — Alien Child Guest

As long as one or more hands are touching A Real Handful, it gets +2/+2.

As long as two or more hands are touching A Real Handful, it has menace.

As long as three or more hands are touching A Real Handful, it has lifelink.

item.title: [unf] Xenosquirrels
item.description:
Creature — Alien Squirrel

Xenosquirrels enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

After you roll a die, you may remove a +1/+1 from Xenosquirrels. If you do, increase or decrease the result by 1.

item.title: [unf] Wolf in _____ Clothing
item.description:
Creature — Wolf Guest

When this creature enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it. When you do, up to X target creatures each get -1/-1 until end of turn, where X is the number of unique vowels on that sticker. (The vowels are A, E, I, O, U, and Y.)

item.title: [unf] Step Right Up
item.description:
Sorcery

Open two Attractions. (Put the top two cards of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

item.title: [unf] Soul Swindler
item.description:
Creature — Demon Employee

As long as you've visited an attraction this turn, Soul Swindler has indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

When Soul Swindler enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

item.title: [unf] Six-Sided Die
item.description:
Instant

Choose target creature. Roll a six-sided die.

1 — It has base power and toughness 1 until end of turn.

2 — Put two -1/-1 counters on it.

3 — Six-Sided Die deals 3 damage to it and you gain 3 life.

4 — It gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

5 — Destroy it.

6 — Exile it.

item.title: [unf] Scooch
item.description:
Instant

Add or subtract 1 from target creature's power, target player's life total, or target die roll's result.

Draw a card.

item.title: [unf] _____ Balls of Fire
item.description:
Enchantment

When this enchantment enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it.

Whenever you put a sticker on this enchantment, it deals damage equal to the number of o's in name stickers on this enchantment to any target.

item.title: [unf] Art Appreciation
item.description:
Sorcery

Put an art sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Then ask a person outside the game to rate its new art on a scale from 1 to 5, where 5 is the best. When they rate the art, up to that many target creatures can't block this turn.

item.title: [unf] Amped Up
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each electrical socket in a wall or floor you can see from your seat.

Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +3/+0 and gains haste.

item.title: [unf] Aardwolf's Advantage
item.description:
Sorcery

Creature you control get +2/+0 and gain alpha strike until end of turn. (A creature with alpha strike has first strike as long as it's blocking or being blocked by a creature that comes after it alphabetically.)

item.title: [unf] Don't Try This at Home
item.description:
Enchantment

If a hot source you control would deal damage, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead. (Something is hot if it has hot things in its art, like fire or explosions.)

{1}{R}, Sacrifice Don't Try This at Home: It deals damage equal to twice the number of hot cards in your graveyard to target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [unf] Circuits Act
item.description:
Sorcery

Roll three six-sided die. For each different result, create a 1/1 white Clown Robot artifact creature token.

item.title: [unf] Carnival Barker
item.description:
Creature — Dog Employee

{T}: You have thirty seconds to laud a creature you control to any people outside the game. Until end of turn, that creature gains trample and haste and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of those people who appluaded. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.

item.title: [unf] Big Winner
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Warrior Guest

Big Winner has trample as long as you control a stickered permanent.

item.title: [unf] Ignacio of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Lizard Performer

As Ignacio of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose armor, blood, book, bottle, fang, fire, scroll, spear, sword, or water.

Whenever you cast a spell with the chosen object in its art, create two Treasure tokens.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [unf] Goblin Girder Gang
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Employee

Reach

Whenever you roll a result not stored on Goblin Girder Gang, you may store that result on it. When you do, Goblin Girder Gang deals 1 damage to any target without a hat.

Goblin Girder Gang gets +1/+0 for each result stored on it.

item.title: [unf] Goblin Cruciverbalist
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Wizard Guest

Haste

When Goblin Cruciverbalist enters the battlefield, create a colorless artifact token named your choice of A, E, I, O, or U.

Whenever Goblin Cruciverbalist attacks, using the first letters of names of permanents you control, spell a word you haven't spelled this game. It gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each letter in that word.

item.title: [unf] _____ Goblin
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Guest

When this creature enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it. Add {R} for each unique vowel on that sticker. (The vowels are A, E, I, O, U, and Y.)

item.title: [unf] Eelectrocute
item.description:
Instant

Eelectrocute deals 2 damage to any target.

You may cast Eelectrocute from your graveyard as long as you've rolled a 6 this turn. If you cast Eelectrocute this way and it would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

item.title: [unf] Priority Boarding
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you roll a die, you may reveal the top card of your library. Do this only once each turn. Whenever you reveal a card with mana value less than the result this way, you may exile it. If you do, you may play it this turn.

item.title: [unf] Opening Ceremony
item.description:
Sorcery

Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}{C}. You may open a sealed Magic booster pack. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among the cards in that booster pack.

item.title: [unf] One-Clown Band
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clown Robot Bard

{2}{R}: Target Robot gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [unf] Non-Human Cannonball
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clown Robot

When Non-Human Cannonball dies, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 4 or less, Non-Human Cannonball deals that much damage to you.

item.title: [unf] Minotaur de Force
item.description:
Creature — Minotaur Performer

Haste

When Minotaur de Force enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own.

item.title: [unf] Wee Champion
item.description:
Creature — Minotaur Child Guest

Whenever you place a sticker, Wee Champion gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If it's an art sticker, instead put a +1/+1 counter on Wee Champion.

item.title: [unf] Trigger Happy
item.description:
Instant

Choose a triggered ability of target permanent. It triggers. You control that ability.

item.title: [unf] Ticking Mime Bomb
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Clown Robot Mime

When Ticking Mime Bomb enters the battlefield, without speaking or indicating any specific creature, pantomime to a person outside the game, then they choose a creature you don't control. Ticking Mime Bomb deals damage equal to twice the number of Robots you control to the chosen creature.

item.title: [unf] Slight Malfunction
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Roll a six-side die. When you do, Slight Malfunction deals 1 damage to each of up to X target creatures, where X is the result.

item.title: [unf] Rad Rascal
item.description:
Creature — Devil Employee

When Rad Rascal enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

item.title: [unf] Proficient Pyrodancer
item.description:
Creature — Human Performer

When Proficient Pyrodancer enters the battlefield, you may put an art sticker on a nonland permanent you own.

{2}{R}: Another target creature with an art sticker on it gets +2/+0 and gains menace until end of turn.

item.title: [unf] Well Done
item.description:
Sorcery

Well Done deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature is rare or mythic rare, Well Done deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

item.title: [unf] Chicken Troupe
item.description:
Creature — Bird Performer

Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

When Chicken Troupe enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own.
